normalized: the next day――
as inui suggested, yukikaze had been able to meet tatsurou in the general course students' cafeteria.
naturally, tatsurou was surprised that yukikaze had turned up as a scholarship student.
he had said that he was happy to see yukikaze, and that a seishuu academy uniform looked good on her.

he had even looked adorably like he was sulking a little about the fact that, since he was a general course student, he couldn't go to the elite building, where yukikaze, a scholarship student, lived.
however, what came after that was awful.
truly, unbelievably awful.

name: shizuru
normalized: ufufu, tatsurou-kuun♪

even though she had called it a strategy meeting, that four-eyed woman named shizuru or whatever had shown up looking like she was just out of the bath, and had started clinging to tatsurou and flirting with him in front of yukikaze.

she was sitting right up alongside tatsurou with only her bath towel between them, pressing her body against him more than necessary, talking to him in an over-familiar tone, acting theatrically surprised, etc.
despite saying things like 『please stop it』 with his mouth, tatsurou had been delighted by it, with a leering, indecent, flirtatious face.
at the end of all that, even though yukikaze had said they should get the mission over with quickly and go home, tatsurou had sided with shizuru, and started saying things like “let's wait and see.
he had been saying reasonable things, such as that if they were to perform the force infiltration right after yukikaze moved in, they would be suspected by the enemy, but that was definitely a lie.
tatsurou had been completely seduced by the wiles of that shizuru woman!
because of that, yukikaze had gotten mad and rushed out of the room.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's with that woman?!
what's with that woman?!
what's with that woman?!
while electrifying her entire body in anger, yukikaze was running swiftly through the forest.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's with that 『tatsurou-kuun～』?!
theatrically letting out a mushy voice, even though she's an old lady!

name: yukikaze
normalized: she annoyed me ever since i saw her at school.
what's with that appearance?!
a big-breasted loli teacher?
is she an idiot?

name: yukikaze
normalized: those tryhard pigtails and glasses are just for show, anyway.
it's disgusting.
she's really screwing around!
even though she's an old woman…!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what “flower shizuru”?
what “infiltration specialist”?
she's just a dirty woman, isn't she?
ahh, she pisses me off!
i wanna beat her up now!
as things were, she didn't feel like going back at all.
having been shown something that displeasing, and been put into such an irritated mood, there was no way that she could go to bed quietly.

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou, too!
perverted man!
fawning over her!
cheating man!
idiot!
moron!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's with that 『all in all, i suppose it wouldn't be good to do it right after yukikaze's moved in, would it?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: doesn't he understand i don't want to be with that woman for even one more day?!
thick-skull!
die!
yukikaze cursed the pair over and over again.
an unforgivable supposition suddenly drifted across the back of her mind.

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou, if you actually did something with that woman…

name: yukikaze
normalized: i absolutely will not forgive… something like that…
bachinn!
yukikaze's hair bristled, and discharges of electricity stood out sharply in the dark of night due to her uncontainable anger.
then, at that moment――

name: yukikaze
normalized: （hah…!
yukikaze calmly stopped in her tracks.
that was not for the sake of cooling off.
she had noticed.
the existence of an enemy.
they were here.
very close-by.
she didn't know where, but she sensed them.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm in a bad mood right now!
yukikaze said towards the pitch-black nighttime forest.
the dark forest just responded with silence.

name: yukikaze
normalized: no matter how much you erase your presence, it's futile.
signs from the insect noises and the animals tell me about unusual things in this forest.

name: yukikaze
normalized: if you don't come out, i'll kick your ass.
i'm pretty annoyed right now, so i feel like going on a rampage.

name: yukikaze
normalized: don't feel like coming out…?
well, okay.
yukikaze drew the two “lightning shooters” from her hips.
she took a fighting posture.
her head, which had been boiling hot, suddenly cleared up.
while boosting her anti-demon power, so that she could deal with anything they did from wherever they were, she thought it over.
they were hiding themselves superbly.
she didn't sense their presence at all, even now.
however, they were definitely there.
the state of the forest was indicating the existence of an enemy.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （i wonder if it's the rubber woman they mentioned…?
it was not a student or teacher from the academy, or a security guard.
it was a pro, a strong enemy who would rank next to a taimanin.
there really was something in this school.
shuu!
faintly, the sound of something cutting through the air.
from directly opposite her.
glinting momentarily in the dark.
it was a kunai.

name: yukikaze
normalized: don't underestimate me!
she had been able to grasp their position thanks to that.
yukikaze perfectly read the kunai's trajectory, then evaded it with the slightest of motions, and shot her lightning shooters in the direction from which it had been fired.
――or, should have.
the figure of a person had rushed out from amid the darkness.
they drew near yukikaze with speed so great that they overtook the kunai they had fired off.

name: yukikaze
normalized: wha?!
an attack beyond her imagination.
a chill ran through her.

name: yukikaze
normalized: kuh!
yukikaze just barely managed to avoid the enemy's claws.
and then, she saw.
the figure of an extremely bizarre woman, who covered her entire body in jet-black rubber.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you――!
bashuu!
while avoiding the attack, she fired balls of lightning at almost point-blank range.
shunn!
as if she had been anticipating that, the rubber woman promptly dodged them.

name: yukikaze
normalized: like i'd like you get away!
bashuu!
bashuu!
bashuu!
yukikaze shot lightning balls continuously.
however, the rubber woman made use of the forest's trees to evade yukikaze's lightning attacks one by one.
conversely, she had taken advantage of the slight time lag in charging the two lightning shooters, and approached yukikaze at super speed.

name: yukikaze
normalized: here goes!
even though they had met for the first time, she was clearly fighting with an understanding of yukikaze's abilities.
yukikaze's lightning shooters displayed formidable power at mid-range and up.
however, because they took the form of small guns, they naturally proved to be a disadvantage in hand-to-hand combat.

name: rubber woman
normalized: shh!
a sharp breath escaped from the woman's mouth, which held a ball gag inside it.
the enemy's left and right claws had headed for yukikaze at close range.
however, yukikaze at least understood her own weaknesses.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm saying, don't underestimate me!

name: yukikaze
normalized: “＜lightning blast＞”
baribaribaribarihh!

name: rubber woman
normalized: hh?!

yukikaze purposely drew in the rubber woman (who had charged at her during the pauses between lightning balls) until the last moment, and fired a lightning attack centred around herself, by deliberately making a lightning shooter explosively discharge.
it was a new technique, effective against enemies who carelessly drew close to her.

name: rubber woman
normalized: hh!
receiving the lightning attack right up close, the rubber woman was blown away.
it was a powerful burst of lightning that would instantly kill a human, and of course most mazoku (demons).
and yet, the rubber woman immediately stood up, unsteadily.

name: yukikaze
normalized: looks like you were saved by that ridiculous outfit, huh?
after saying that, yukikaze realized.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （that ridiculous outfit… could it be for fighting me…?
it was possible.
otherwise, she wouldn't be able to dodge yukikaze's lightning balls at first sight like this, either.
an opponent yukikaze had fought against before, perhaps?
was she also hiding her face so that her true identity wouldn't be known to yukikaze?

name: yukikaze
normalized: who are you?
yukikaze tried asking, despite being aware that the rubber woman wasn't going to answer.
the rubber woman naturally didn't reply, but she did express a sneering smile on her face.
yukikaze could only see the woman's lips (and her mouth was holding a ball gag inside it, so she could barely tell her facial expression), but she had gotten that impression.
like when that disgusting woman, shizuru, had been looking at yukikaze alongside tatsurou.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm definitely gonna mess you up!
the anger from before, which she had started to forget because of the battle, was resurrected.
if she did any more than this, she might be noticed by washizu's lot, but she didn't care.
if that happened, then once she took down the rubber woman, she would just go and launch an assault on the research facility.
ultimately, battle was the essence of taimanin missions.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you can't dodge a serious lightning attack from me with ridiculous clothes like that, can you?

name: yukikaze
normalized: so, i'll show you the power of the lightning strike taimanin.
yukikaze prepared to fire her one remaining lightning shooter, but

name: yukikaze
normalized: …damn.
she realized that the rubber woman had not been the only one who took damage from their exchange just now.
blood was faintly trickling from her upper left arm.
the one which had just made her lightning shooter burst with electricity.
in that instant, as she received the lightning attack, the rubber woman had slashed at yukikaze.
as she suspected, this was an opponent she couldn't get careless around.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i wonder if taking you alive would be too much work.

name: yukikaze
normalized: after i tore that mask off and learned your true identity, i was planning to make you spit out your objective, but i'll give up on that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: sorry, but turn to cinders here.
the rubber woman made a malicious sneering smile again at yukikaze, who had prepared herself, and

name: yukikaze
normalized: eh…?
suddenly performed an unexpected action.
for some reason, she had run away.

name: yukikaze
normalized: like i'd let you escape!
naturally, yukikaze was about to chase her, but

name: yukikaze
normalized: …hh?!
then, she noticed something abnormal about her body.
the scratch on the arm that had been attacked was hot.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （poison?!
the start of her pursuit was delayed by her surprise.
the rubber woman couldn't be seen anymore.
furthermore, the presences of what seemed like the academy's security guards were approaching.
was this their regular patrol?
they were still at quite a distance, but they were definitely heading in this direction.

name: yukikaze
normalized: is this the reason she ran off?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: even though she went to the trouble of poisoning me, she ran away from the school's security guards…?!
incomprehensible.
the rubber woman's true identity, and her objective.
however, there was no time to be thinking about that now.
yukikaze also had to get away from here quickly.
and counteract the poison.
yukikaze abandoned her pursuit.

while walking quickly, so that she wouldn't be sensed by the guards that were coming along, but leisurely, so that the poison wouldn't circulate, she drove the needle of a portable neutralizer into herself.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hh…
it was a taimanin device which combined all sorts of antidotes, so it worked on most poisons, but there was no sign that it had been effective.
on the contrary, her heart pounded, her entire body grew hot, her throat became dry, and she started aching deep in her belly.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （shit… this feeling… it's probably, an aphrodisiac-type…）
that disgusting experience of having been on the verge of becoming a slave prostitute in yomihara had taught her.
it was too much for this neutralizer to handle.
she had to get back to the dormitory quickly, and use the special antidote for aphrodisiacs.
it had been the right call to ask that mad scientist, kiryuu, to make it after the lessons of yomihara.
the reason why she didn't have it on hand here was that the special antidote was in vibrator form, of all things, and one used it by putting it in there.
there was no way she could bring such an embarrassing thing with her.
in fact, she was supposed to carry it with her at all times, but her self-confidence as a taimanin, and shame as a girl, would not allow that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm really pissed off!
that vulgar guy!
yukikaze was letting out a loud voice without thinking.
that rubber woman.
herself, who had made an embarrassing blunder.
that pervert, kiryuu.
that dirty woman, shizuru.
the lecherous tatsurou.
she felt angry at all of them.
hearing her voice, the guards approached, saying 「that way!
」, 「it's a woman!
」, and so forth.

name: yukikaze
normalized: （oh, come on!
this is the worst!
while exercising control over her body, which ached from the aphrodisiac, through her anger towards various people, yukikaze hurried to the dormitory.
yukikaze hadn't realized.
that it wasn't just an aphrodisiac that had invaded her through that scratch.
that a more cunning micro-invader was already starting to attack her.
that itself had been the rubber woman's true aim, and was an evil trap with the purpose of corrupting yukikaze.
